page.title: 18SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content: IN OVERTON THERE ARE SPORTS FACILITIES WHICH PROVIDE:RUGBY,SQUASH,BADMINTON, PITCH AND PUTT AND ARCHERY.IN LAVERSTOKE THERE ARE ADEQUATE SPORTS FACILITIES.PORTALS SPORTS AND SOCIAL CLUB PROVIDES:TENNIS,BOWLS,CRICKET, FOOTBALL,TABLE TENNIS,SNOOKER AND POOL.LAVERSTOKE SCHOOLS RECREATION GROUND IS RENTED FROM THE PARISH BUT IT CAN BE USED BY THE PUBLIC.THESE ARE SOME OF THE SPORTS THAT LAVERSTOKE SCHOOL PLAY:ROUNDERS,STOOL BALL, FOOTBALL, NETBALL,ATHLETICS AND SWIMMING.EVERY YEAR OUR SCHOOL GOES TO AMPORT TO DO ATHLETICS.WE COMPETE AGAINST OTHER SMALL SCHOOLS IN THE AREA. WE ALSO HOST THE ROUNDERS RALLY ON THE CRICKET GROUND.WE GO SWIMMING AT OVERTON SCHOOL. WE PLAY NETBALL AND FOOTBALL AT OUR SCHOOL OR AT OTHER SCHOOLS.
